data.name: The Care Alliances
data.description: Care Alliances is a PHP-based platform designed to streamline healthcare collaborations, offering secure data management and efficient communication for better patient care.

data.name: Bagisto
data.description: Bagsito is a customized eCommerce platform designed for seamless bag shopping. Built with Laravel, it features a user-friendly interface, secure payments, and efficient order management.

data.name: Krayin CRM
data.description: Krayin CRM is an open-source customer relationship management solution built on Laravel. I customized and implemented Krayin CRM to enhance business workflows, streamline customer interactions, and improve sales management. This project showcases my expertise in Laravel, CRM customization, and efficient business process automation.
